# scam.beauty — Beauty & Cosmetics Scam Database

> Community-powered database of beauty & cosmetics scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the beauty & cosmetics industry.


scam.beauty is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the beauty & cosmetics industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Beauty & Cosmetics scam database and community reports](https://scam.beauty)


## Keywords

beauty & cosmetics scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.beauty
